tasks.title: Project Foundation Setup
tasks.description: Initialize Next.js 14+ project with TypeScript, Material UI, and development tools. Install @mui/material, @mui/icons-material, @emotion/react, @emotion/styled. Configure project structure, linting, and coding standards for macOS-style design.

tasks.title: Database Schema Design
tasks.description: Design and implement Supabase PostgreSQL schema with all required tables: workspace, section, task, user, event, workspace_members. Include proper relationships, constraints, and indexes.

tasks.title: TypeScript Type Definitions
tasks.description: Create comprehensive TypeScript types for all data models: Workspace, Section, Task, User, Event. Ensure type safety across the application.

tasks.title: Google OAuth Authentication
tasks.description: Implement Google OAuth authentication using Next.js and Supabase Auth. Handle login, logout, session management, and user profile creation.

tasks.title: Design System Foundation
tasks.description: Create macOS-style design system using MUI ThemeProvider with custom theme configuration. Define color palette, typography, spacing, and component tokens. Implement day/night mode theming support using MUI's dark mode capabilities.

tasks.title: Navigation Sidebar Component
tasks.description: Build responsive navigation sidebar using MUI Drawer, List, and ListItem components. Include search bar, user info, workspace/section hierarchy, and settings. Implement resize functionality for tablet/PC modes with MUI breakpoint system.

tasks.title: Main Content Area Layout
tasks.description: Create main content area using MUI Container, Box, and Grid components with header (refresh IconButton), filter bar, and content sections. Implement responsive layout using MUI Grid system and infinite scroll capability.

tasks.title: Task Card Component
tasks.description: Build task card component using MUI Card, CardContent, and CardActions with inline editing capabilities. Use MUI Select for assignee/status dropdowns, implement drag-and-drop support, and modal trigger functionality.

tasks.title: Task Detail Modal
tasks.description: Create comprehensive task detail modal using MUI Dialog, DialogTitle, and DialogContent components. Implement full task editing with MUI TextField, Select, Button, and FormControl components. Include validation and proper form handling.

tasks.title: Spotlight Search Modal
tasks.description: Implement spotlight-style search modal using MUI Dialog with full-screen overlay, MUI Autocomplete or custom Dialog for search interface. Include auto-focus, keyboard navigation, and search result display with navigation.

tasks.title: Workspace Management API
tasks.description: Implement API endpoints and hooks for workspace CRUD operations, member management, and permission handling.

tasks.title: Section Management API
tasks.description: Create API endpoints and hooks for section CRUD operations within workspaces, including proper authorization and data validation.

tasks.title: Task Management API
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive task API with CRUD operations, status updates, assignment, drag-and-drop reordering, and soft delete functionality.

tasks.title: Search Functionality
tasks.description: Implement full-text search across workspace titles, section titles, task titles, and descriptions with relevance ranking.

tasks.title: Event Logging System
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive event logging for all user actions with proper tracking and activity history functionality.

tasks.title: Today Tasks View
tasks.description: Create Today Tasks view with proper filtering logic (startAt ≤ today ≤ expiredAt AND status ≠ completed) and priority indicators.

tasks.title: Completed Tasks View
tasks.description: Implement completed tasks view with filtering, reopen functionality, and proper status handling.

tasks.title: Activities Page
tasks.description: Create activities page showing event history with filtering capabilities and proper pagination.

tasks.title: URL Routing & Navigation
tasks.description: Implement proper URL routing for all pages, including search query parameters and deep linking to task modals.

tasks.title: Data Caching & Real-time Updates
tasks.description: Implement data caching with SWR/React Query and real-time updates for user actions with manual refresh for others.

tasks.title: Infinite Scroll Implementation
tasks.description: Add infinite scroll functionality for large task lists with proper pagination and performance optimization.

tasks.title: Testing Suite Setup
tasks.description: Set up comprehensive testing with Jest, React Testing Library, and Cypress for unit, integration, and e2e tests.

tasks.title: Component Tests
tasks.description: Write comprehensive unit tests for all React components, hooks, and utilities.

tasks.title: API Integration Tests
tasks.description: Create integration tests for all API endpoints, database operations, and authentication flows.

tasks.title: E2E User Journey Tests
tasks.description: Implement end-to-end tests covering complete user journeys: login, workspace creation, task management, and search functionality.

tasks.title: Production Deployment Setup
tasks.description: Configure production deployment pipeline with Vercel/Netlify, environment variables, and database migrations.

tasks.title: Performance Optimization
tasks.description: Optimize application performance with code splitting, image optimization, lazy loading, and bundle analysis.

tasks.title: Accessibility Implementation
tasks.description: Ensure full accessibility compliance with WCAG guidelines, keyboard navigation, screen reader support, and semantic HTML.

tasks.title: Error Handling & Monitoring
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive error handling, error boundaries, and monitoring with proper logging and user feedback.

tasks.title: Documentation & User Guide
tasks.description: Create comprehensive documentation including API docs, component storybook, user guide, and development setup instructions.

metadata.projectDescription: Todo list application with workspace > section > task hierarchy, macOS-style design, and Google OAuth authentication
